name: At the Bottom of The Void
name_original: At the Bottom of The Void
description:
At the Bottom of the Void is an action-adventure game where you make deals with entities to gain powers, giving them something in exchange.

The player must make it to the end of the abyss, descending through all the levels. Everytime they go deeper, they will encounter more dangerous enemies, but also more powerful magic that will aid them on the dangerous adventure.

Everything comes with a cost in The Void.  For example, an entity, in order to grant you their power, will ask for one of your legs, which will now make you move slower and be less agile. Maybe another will ask for your arm, and now you won’t be able to handle two-handed weapons.

Game for Pirate's Software Game Jam.

CONTROLS

Move - WASD or Arrow keys.
Q - Interact
I - Inventory
H - Attack
Spacebar - roll
Enter - continue conversation

If enter doesn't work to continue the conversation, just click on the small square at the bottom right of the dialogue box to continue.

There's no goal since it's just a prototype, but you can fight enemies, meet 3 entities and 5 NPCs.

Coding, art, and game design by Unlost Pixel
Art by Alaska
Music by Garrett Rose
